Str-of.description: Get a new stringable object from the given string. (v7.x)

Str-after.description: The Str::after method returns everything after the given value in a string. The entire string will be returned if the value does not exist within the string.

Str-afterLast.description: The Str::afterLast method returns everything after the last occurrence of the given value in a string. The entire string will be returned if the value does not exist within the string. (v6.x)

Str-ascii.description: The Str::ascii method will attempt to transliterate the string into an ASCII value.

Str-before.description: Get the portion of a string before the first occurrence of a given value.

Str-beforeLast.description: Get the portion of a string before the last occurrence of a given value. (v6.x)

Str-between.description: Get the portion of a string between two given values. (v7.x)

Str-camel.description: Convert a value to camel case.

Str-contains.description: Return boolean. Determine if a given string contains a given substring.

Str-containsAll.description: Determine if a given string contains all array values. (v5.8)

Str-endsWith.description: Return boolean. Determine if a given string ends with a given substring.

Str-finish.description: Cap a string with a single instance of a given value.

Str-is.description: Return boolean. Determine if a given string matches a given pattern.

Str-isAscii.description: Determine if a given string is 7 bit ASCII. (v7.x)

Str-isUuid.description: Return boolean. Determine if a given string is a valid UUID. (v6.x)

Str-kebab.description: Convert a string to kebab case.

Str-length.description: Return the length of the given string.

Str-limit.description: Truncates the given string at the specified length

Str-lower.description: Convert the given string to lower-case.

Str-words.description: Limit the number of words in a string.

Str-parseCallback.description: Return array. Parse a Class@method style callback into class and method. $default is null or given string.

Str-plural.description: Get the plural form of an English word.

Str-pluralStudly.description: Pluralize the last word of an English, studly caps case string. (v5.8)

Str-random.description: Generate a more truly random alpha-numeric string.

Str-replaceArray.description: Replace a given value in the string sequentially with an array.

Str-replaceFirst.description: Replace the first occurrence of a given value in the string.

Str-replaceLast.description: Replace the last occurrence of a given value in the string.

Str-start.description: Begin a string with a single instance of a given value.

Str-upper.description: Convert the given string to upper-case.

Str-title.description: Convert the given string to title case.

Str-singular.description: Get the singular form of an English word.

Str-slug.description: Generate a URL friendly slug from a given string.

Str-snake.description: Convert a string to snake case.

Str-startsWith.description: Return boolean. Determine if a given string starts with a given substring.

Str-studly.description: Convert a value to studly caps case.

Str-substr.description: Returns the portion of string specified by the start and length parameters.

Str-substrCount.description: Returns the number of substring occurrences. (v7.x)

Str-ucfirst.description: Make a string's first character uppercase.

Str-createUuidsUsing.description: void. Set the callable that will be used to generate UUIDs. (v6.x)

Str-createUuidsNormally.description: void. Indicate that UUIDs should be created normally and not using a custom factory. (v6.x)
